AddMonths(DateTime, Int32, Boolean)

Returns the date resulting from adding the given number of months to this date.

Declaration
public static DateTime AddMonths(this DateTime date, int monthOffset, bool useLastDay)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.DateTime date

The date.
System.Int32 monthOffset

The month offset.
System.Boolean useLastDay

if set to true, the call preserves last day of the month, 2000/02/28 => 2000/01/31.
Returns
Type Description
System.DateTime

Updated date.
